scripts.sync-figma-to-css: npm run clean && npm run sync-figma-to-tokens && npm run process-tokens-to-css
scripts.cp-css-to-app: if test -n "$LEADGENIE_ROOT"; then cp ./dist/* $LEADGENIE_ROOT/packages/design-system/src/foundations/css-variables/design-tokens/figma/; else echo '$LEADGENIE_ROOT is empty, set this to the path of your project'; exit 1; fi
